paper_title.ja: 「日本的取引慣行」と法社会学:法社会学の視点から
paper_title.en: Business Transaction Practices in Japan ----From the Viewpoint of Sociology of Law

description.ja: Long-term contractual relationships are one of the most notable characteristics of business transactions in Japan. In this paper, this characteristic is explained in the context of Kawashima's sociology of law principles, and this explanation is then contrasted with explanations using a micro-economic approach (ie, a typically individualistic method) and with Macneil's sociological analysis of contract (ie, which represents one version of collective social theories).
description.en: Long-term contractual relationships are one of the most notable characteristics of business transactions in Japan. In this paper, this characteristic is explained in the context of Kawashima's sociology of law principles, and this explanation is then contrasted with explanations using a micro-economic approach (ie, a typically individualistic method) and with Macneil's sociological analysis of contract (ie, which represents one version of collective social theories).
